description: BR-32 is the District Transport Office for Madhubani, Bihar, situated in the historic Mithila heartland. It oversees essential services including vehicle registration, licensing, and permit issuance for a district known for its cultural heritage and proximity to the Nepal border. The office plays a vital role in maintaining transport regulations and safety across sub-divisions like Jainagar and Jhanjharpur.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Bhoop Narayan Singh Colony, Madhubani, Bihar
